Description: Title of the media.
Brief description of the what the media is about. (Netflix Movies and Shows dataset)
Example: To protect his family from a powerful drug lord, skilled thief Mehdi and his expert team of robbers are pulled into a violent and deadly turf war.

Description: Year the movie was initially released.
Runtime for the movie or for a singluar episode if the media is a show.
IMDb score ID.
IMDb score of the media.
Number of IMDb votes for the media.
Unique ID for the show / movie. Begins with "s" and has a number after. Primary key for this dataset.
Either "SHOW" or "MOVIE" defining the media as a show or movie respectively.
Director name.
List of actor names that were casted in the movie.
Example: Sami Bouajila, Tracy Gotoas, Samuel Jouy, Nabiha Akkari, Sofia Lesaffre, Salim Kechiouche, Noureddine Farihi, Geert Van Rampelberg, Bakary Diombera

Description: Country of production.
Date that the media was added to the Netflix platform.
Content rating.
Number of releases (shows go by number of season releases, movies are 1)
Genres that the media is listed in.
Example: Crime TV Shows, International TV Shows, TV Action & Adventure

Description: Brief description of the what the media is about. (Netflix IMDb Scores dataset)
Example: Mehdi, a qualified robber, and Liana, an apprentice thief, get involved in a turf war between drug dealers, and have to collaborate in order to save their loved ones.

Description: Number of genres the entry is in
The first listed cast member (most popular)
Average frequency of actors in other films to measure their popularity
Average frequency of genres that this movie is associated with
